fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - "Refine" a player, changing their role. The host must write a new role that massively modifies their current role, whether in a positive or negative way, but must keep the basic idea.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a role can't be refined, you instead kill your target. Also, if you target the same person twice, you also kill them.
- Yes, you can self target.
